description: British variant pronunciation and spelling of snicker.

entries.meaning: A partly suppressed or broken laugh.

verbs.description: snigger (third-person singular simple present sniggers, present participle sniggering, simple past and past participle sniggered)

examples: [â€¦] presently the Mole's spirits revived again, and he was even able to give some straight back-talk to a couple of moorhens who were sniggering to each other about his bedraggled appearance.
